mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_order ( oid,title,catalog, creater_Id,creater_Name,creater_Tel,creater_Longitude,creater_Latitude, shops_Longtitude,shops_Latitude, accepter_Id,create_Date,accept_Date, public_field1,public_field2, estimated_Worth,remark, aid,reward,status, created_User,created_Time, modified_User,modified_Time ) VALUES ( #{oid}, #{title},#{catalog}, #{creater_Id},#{creater_Name},#{creater_Tel},#{creater_Longitude},#{creater_Latitude}, #{shops_Longtitude},#{shops_Latitude}, #{accepter_Id},#{create_Date},#{accept_Date}, #{public_field1},#{public_field2}, #{estimated_Worth},#{remark}, #{aid},#{reward},#{status}, #{created_User},#{created_Time}, #{modified_User},#{modified_Time} )
mapper.update: UPDATE t_order SET title=#{title},catalog=#{catalog}, creater_Id=#{creater_Id},creater_Name=#{creater_Name},creater_Tel=#{creater_Tel},creater_Longitude=#{creater_Longitude},creater_Latitude=#{creater_Latitude}, shops_Longtitude=#{shops_Longtitude},shops_Latitude=#{shops_Latitude}, accepter_Id=#{accepter_Id},create_Date=#{create_Date},accept_Date=#{accept_Date}, public_field1=#{public_field1},public_field2=#{public_field2}, estimated_Worth=#{estimated_Worth},remark=#{remark}, aid=#{aid},reward=#{reward},status=#{status}, modified_User=#{modified_User},modified_Time=#{modified_Time} WHERE oid=#{oid}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE create_Date BETWEEN #{headdate} AND #{taildate} AND status=0 ORDER BY create_Date DESC limit ${(page-1)*size},${size}
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE title LIKE #{title} AND status=0 ORDER BY create_Date DESC limit ${(page-1)*size},${size}
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE ( creater_Id=#{id} OR accepter_Id=#{id} ) AND status=#{status} ORDER BY create_Date DESC limit ${(page-1)*size},${size}
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE creater_Id=#{id} OR accepter_Id=#{id} ORDER BY create_Date DESC limit ${(page-1)*size},${size}
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE status=0 ORDER BY create_Date DESC limit ${(page-1)*size},${size}
